title: Pixel XL - upgraded to Android 10, messaging and other apps keep sleeping in background
content:
Hello,

I have a Pixel XL.  After wiping and installing factory .zip for Android 10, whatsapp, email, etc apps go to sleep if you don't use them for a while, and will not update until I open them.

I have tried adjusting battery optimization, etc, to no avail.

I am missing notifications, etc because of this.  Email, for instance, will not update until I manually open it and update it.

Please, how to fix this?
